title: Schuylkill River Valley National Heritage Area: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           140 College Drive  Pottstown, PA 19464                 Directions         From Highway 422 headed north out of Philadelphia, exit South Hanover Street and turn right at the intersection. After you cross the Schuylkill River turn left on to College Drive. The office will be on the left.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Hours vary by location park locations all vary for hours. Visit the main heritage area webpage for details. schuylkillriver.org   Standard Hours    Sunday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Monday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Tuesday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Wednesday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Thursday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Friday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM   Saturday: 12:00 AM - 12:00 AM             Weather           Winters on the river are cold and damp with a cool spring and fall and a hot and humid summer. Sturdy hiking shoes are recommended for outdoor recreation during the snowy wintery season.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Entrance fees vary - $0.00 There are many sites and museums inside the heritage area, each one has varying fees.         Visitor Centers                  Visit individual sites’ pages or events on the Heritage Area’s website for operating hours, seasons, fees and reservation information.
